queries.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__ldap_config` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `host` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `port` int(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `version3` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `negotiate_tls` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `follow_referrals` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `basedn` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `connect_username` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `connect_password` varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__ldap_template` ( `tid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `configid` int(11) NOT NULL, `template_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `container` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `rdn` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `userdn` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `attributes` text, `objectclasses` text, PRIMARY KEY (`tid`), KEY `tid` (`tid`), KEY `tid_2` (`tid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__ldap_group` ( `groupid` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `groupname` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `gtemplateid` int(11) NOT NULL, `utemplateid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`groupid`,`groupname`,`gtemplateid`,`utemplateid`), UNIQUE KEY `groupname` (`groupname`,`gtemplateid`,`utemplateid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ;
